channel.title: Nodules on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Nodules on funPlantGenes

item.title: EIF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.06G269600 Gene Symbol: EIF1 Gene Name: EUKARYOTIC TRANSLATION INITIATION FACTOR 1 Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Our results indicate the potential of RPS28 and EIF1 promoters to facilitate future genetic engineering and breeding to improve the quality and yield of soybean, as well as in a wide variety of other plant species.

item.title: GmbHLH300
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.03G130600 Gene Symbol: GmbHLH300 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmYSL7 knockout increases the expression of GmbHLH300, a transcription factor required for Fe response of nodules.

item.title: GmbHLH57
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.12G178500 Gene Symbol: GmbHLH57 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: The expression of GmbHLH57 and GmbHLH300, two Fe-related genes expressed in nodules of Gmysl7 mutants.

item.title: GmHSP17.9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.17G045800 Gene Symbol: GmHSP17.9 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: A small heat shock protein, GmHSP17.

item.title: GmNF-YC4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma06g17780 Gene Symbol: GmNF-YC4 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Phosphate starvation responsive GmSPX5 mediates nodule growth through interaction with GmNF-YC4 in soybean.

item.title: GmNMHC5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.13g2552001 Gene Symbol: GmNMHC5 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: A model illustrating the mechanism by which GmNMHC5 promotes soybean nodulation is presented.

item.title: GmNOD100;GmSS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.13G114000 Gene Symbol: GmNOD100Â GmSS1 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmNOD100, a sucrose synthase in soybean nodules which was also preferentially expressed in the infected zone of nodules, similar to GmHSP17.

item.title: GmPHR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.19G167500 Gene Symbol: GmPHR1 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: The GmPHR1 to GmPHR4 proteins share two conserved functional domains, the Myb coiled-coil motif (a potential dimerization motif) and the Myb DNA-binding motif, indicating potential binding activity for their target genes.

item.title: GmPHR4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.10G039700 Gene Symbol: GmPHR4 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: A soybean phosphorus transporter (GmPHT1; 11) and four phosphorus stress response factors (GmPHR1~GmPHR4).

item.title: GmPHT1.11
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.14G188000 Gene Symbol: GmPHT1.11 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmPHT1.

item.title: GmYSL7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.11G203400 Gene Symbol: GmYSL7 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmYSL7 controls iron uptake, allocation, and cellular response of nodules in soybean.

item.title: RPS28
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.19G203300 Gene Symbol: RPS28 Gene Name: 40S RIBOSOMAL PROTEIN SMALL SUBUNIT S28 Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Our results indicate the potential of RPS28 and EIF1 promoters to facilitate future genetic engineering and breeding to improve the quality and yield of soybean, as well as in a wide variety of other plant species.
